summary: PASSENGER SIDE SUN VISOR DROPPED STRAIGHT DOWN AND WILL NOT STAY UP. I CANNOT SEE THROUGH IT SO IT BLOCKS VISIBILITY TO MY RIGHT UNLESS I USE A HAND TO HOLD IT UP. THIS HAPPENED WHILE DRIVING THE WEST VIRGINIA TURNPIKE (ALTHOUGH I DOUBT THAT HAD ANYTHING TO DO WITH THE MALFUNCTION) AND SWUNG IT DOWN TO KEEP SUN OUT OF MY EYES. NEVER STAYED UP SINCE.
